mission.posting: Crypto wants to play a prank on one of the Hacker Wars Members. He needs you to steal some EXE files from one of them.

email.subject: The Great Cipher
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#,
I've got a hilarious prank to play on one of the Hacker Wars members. You remember 5plinter right? He's crazy proud, why don't we show him a little fun Cryp7o style ;)
I want you to break in to his Laptop and get admin access. From there, I need you to download all his tool files and then delete them from his laptop. Once you've got the file upload them to my computer (also linked below) I'm going to encrypt them with a super secure password :)
BATTLEBOARD REMINDER: When you have completed Cryp7o's task he will become an official member of your team.

attachments.note: Download EXE tools from 5plinter's laptop and delete them. Then upload the files downloaded to Cryp7o's Toolstation in the folder "home/Upload"
